thread.title: What Christie Brinkley Eats in a Day - Christie Brinkley Diet

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: What Christie Brinkley Eats in a Day - Christie Brinkley Diet
text:
This week Christie Brinkley will return to Sports Illustrated's Swimsuit Issue ‚Äî nearly four decades since her debut in 1979 and 13 years since her last photo shoot in a swimsuit. But she's definitely still got it in 2017. In fact, the 63-year-old model makes 60-something look like 20-something , and it got us thinking: What is she eating and how in the world does she maintain that killer bikini bod ? Here's everything you need to know.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Yes! I am excited to announce that I am back in @si_swimsuit ..I figured with my gorgeous daughters @alexarayjoel and @sailorbrinkleycook by my side whose going to be looking at me! Oh and My kids think I walk on water, so let's not mention the apple box concealed just under the surface. For a preview check out @people.com ..and thank you Sports Illustrated for sending the powerful message that good things come in packages of every size and we do not come with an expiration date! üå∏üå¥psI can‚Äôt wait to see everyone at VIBES on Feb 17th and 18th in Houston! #proudmomhere! #vibes
A photo posted by Christie Brinkley (@christiebrinkley) on Feb 6, 2017 at 6:22pm PST
She gave up dieting a long time ago. "I tried some pretty weird diets in the beginning... everything from juice fasting to eating one kind of food at a time, to eating a grapefruit first before everything," she explained to New York Magazine in 2015 . "The only thing that really lasts is a well-balanced diet ."
She starts every morning with warm water and lemon. "It's something I picked up on my Instagram," she told New York Magazine. Brinkley puts a bit of manuka honey and cayenne pepper into her hot water with the juice of a whole lemon , then sips it every morning ‚Äî before she even thinks about making a cup of coffee ‚Äî to get herself revved up for the day.
Her breakfast is very, very full. In a 2014 interview with Harper's Bazaar , Brinkley said she loves sheep-milk yogurt mixed with blackberries, blueberries, raspberries, papaya, chia seeds, raw oatmeal, and walnuts. If she wants more protein, she'll whip up an egg-white omelet with spinach and mushrooms. She's also a huge fan of avocado toast .
The Fruits of my Labor!!! #homegrown #organic #goodforyou #goodforourplanet #goorganic!
A photo posted by Christie Brinkley (@christiebrinkley) on Aug 20, 2016 at 8:36am PDT
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below She's a strict vegetarian... ...but a self-described flexible vegan . "Because, you know, Italy exists," she joked with New York Magazine. "Mozzarella and pasta exist. In France, I may have to have a piece of Camembert , you know. Un petit sandwich au fromage [a cheese sandwich]." But she hasn't touched a piece of meat since she was 12 and, over the years, has fluctuated between eating different types of dairy .
Her lunch is light, but she fills up with snacks. "I always have a salad with whatever grain or bean was left over from dinner piled on top," she explained to Harper's Bazaar. Then, later in the afternoon, she'll make fresh juice using kale, lime juice, orange juice, and avocado and snack on a homemade pumpkin-seed mix made with Himalayan salt, walnuts, Brazil nuts, sunflower seeds, and dried raisins. If she's hungry before lunch, an apple ‚Äî sometimes with peanut butter ‚Äî is her go-to post-breakfast snack .

We'll be on location in the Gorgeous Veneto Region of Italy! Her dinners are super colorful. "My favorite dish is brown rice with lentils, roasted red and yellow peppers, and fennel with a sweet potato and a salad on the side," she told Harper's Bazaar. A ton of different veggies with grains ‚Äî or, as she puts it, going for "as many colors as possible in a day" ‚Äî is the goal. And she's not against imbibing while she eats: "I like a glass of red wine with dinner because it doesn't interfere with my sleep."

She's obsessed with chocolate. Brinkley told Harper's Bazaar she indulges in one splurge every single day : a Gnosis Pom A√ßai raw chocolate bar .
